message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you in the first round.
I think we can both do better.  Let's split it more evenly.  This offer gives you a good chunk of the money, but also leaves more for me in the next rounds.
Okay, Bob, let's try this again. I'll take a little less than my last offer, giving you a better deal. $55 for me, $45 for you.  It's important to remember the money loses value with each round!
